Class Drupal\gtm_datalayer\PrivateTempStoreFactory extends deprecated class Drupal\user\PrivateTempStoreFactory. Deprecated in drupal:8.5.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Core\TempStore\PrivateTempStoreFactory instead.
Add core_version_requirement: ^8 || ^9 to gtm_datalayer.info.yml to designate that the module is compatible with Drupal 9. See https://www.drupal.org/node/3070687.
A drupal/core requirement is not present in composer.json. Having a composer.json is not a requirement for Drupal 9 compatibility but if there is one, it should include a drupal/core requirement.
